original: @38a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @38a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa dva ya ni ri ka bha ba na kra ma /
analyzed: aa dva ya ni ri ka bha ba na kra ma /
translated: Advayanirītibhāvanākrama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa /
analyzed: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa /
translated: The Stages of Meditation on the Non-Dual Channel

original: gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to non-dual great bliss!

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi klong dkyil du //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi klong dkyil du //
translated: In the center of the expanse of equality,

original: myos pas dbyings su rin chen stor //
analyzed: myos pas dbyings su rin chen stor //
translated: The jewel is lost in the space of intoxication.

original: kye ma rigs nyams ngo mtshar cha //
analyzed: kye ma rigs nyams ngo mtshar cha //
translated: Alas, the lineage is ruined, how wondrous!

original: mnyam nyid gnas su gnyis med 'gyur //
analyzed: mnyam nyid gnas su gnyis med 'gyur //
translated: In the abode of equality, non-duality occurs.

original: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since I did not realize that,

original: ni la kha na dhas mtshams su 'joms //
analyzed: ni la kha na dhas mtshams su 'joms //
translated: I am destroyed at the edge of the nīla-khaṇḍa.

original: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since I did not realize that,

original: dge slong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
analyzed: dge slong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
translated: I am destroyed at the edge of the bhikṣu.

original: gnyis med sems ni gnyis med 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis med sems ni gnyis med 'gyur //
translated: The non-dual mind becomes non-dual,

original: mkha' yi bdag nyid mgul nas mkhyud //
analyzed: mkha' yi bdag nyid mgul nas mkhyud //
translated: Embraced from the neck by the nature of space.

original: bdag gzhan brje ba'i khyad par byas //
analyzed: bdag gzhan brje ba'i khyad par byas //
translated: The distinction of exchanging self and other is made,

original: gnyen 'dun thams cad rlag par byas //
analyzed: gnyen 'dun thams cad rlag par byas //
translated: And all relatives are destroyed.

original: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since I did not realize that,

original: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
analyzed: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
translated: I am destroyed at the edge of the nīla-khaṇḍa.

original: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since I did not realize that,

original: dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
analyzed: dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms //
translated: The ascetic destroys it at the border.

original: gzhon nu lo ni bcu gnyis ma //
analyzed: gzhon nu lo ni bcu gnyis ma //
translated: The girl of twelve years

original: ci yang bdag gis rtogs pa med //
analyzed: ci yang bdag gis rtogs pa med //
translated: I do not understand anything at all.

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi byed gnas pas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi byed gnas pas //
translated: The abode of the activity of all yogis

original: 'phyon ma dang ni 'dra bar byas //
analyzed: 'phyon ma dang ni 'dra bar byas //
translated: Is made like a prostitute.

original: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas //
translated: Since I do not understand that,

original: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
analyzed: ni la khan dhas mtshams su 'joms //
translated: Nilakantha destroys it at the border.

original: dung dang gser dang dngul dag kyang //
analyzed: dung dang gser dang dngul dag kyang //
translated: Conches, gold, and silver

original: gcig kyang bdag la dgos pa med //
analyzed: gcig kyang bdag la dgos pa med //
translated: I do not need even one.

original: @38b bdag nyid 'thad pa'i grogs dang 'grogs //
analyzed: @38b bdag nyid 'thad pa'i grogs dang 'grogs //
translated: I associate with a suitable friend.

original: he ru ka la 'khyud pa yis //
analyzed: he ru ka la 'khyud pa yis //
translated: Embracing Heruka

original: bdag gi rgyal srid ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: bdag gi rgyal srid ngo mtshar che //
translated: My kingdom is wondrous.

original: nam mkha' deng rtser chags pa la //
analyzed: nam mkha' deng rtser chags pa la //
translated: Attached to the peak of the sky

original: sus kyang ma mthong ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sus kyang ma mthong ngo mtshar che //
translated: No one sees it, it is wondrous.

original: rnal 'byor ma brgyad dga' zhing 'khyud //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma brgyad dga' zhing 'khyud //
translated: The eight yoginis rejoice and embrace

original: he ru ka dang 'khyud nas gnas //
analyzed: he ru ka dang 'khyud nas gnas //
translated: Dwelling embracing Heruka

original: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa slob dpon ni la khan dhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa slob dpon ni la khan dhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The Meditation on the Nondual Channel composed by the master Nilakantha, transmitted from the master Krishna, is complete.
